fields.label: Funnel Slug
fields.name: funnel_slug
fields.instructions: Unique identifier for this funnel. Used in shortcodes: [hp_funnel_hero funnel="slug"]

fields.label: Stripe Mode
fields.name: stripe_mode
fields.instructions: Which Stripe keys to use for this funnel

fields.label: Logo Link
fields.name: header_logo_link
fields.instructions: URL the logo links to (leave empty for homepage)

fields.label: Products
fields.name: funnel_products
fields.instructions: Add products to display in this funnel

sub_fields.label: Product Search
sub_fields.name: product_search
sub_fields.instructions: Search by name or SKU to auto-fill fields below

sub_fields.label: Display Name
sub_fields.name: display_name
sub_fields.instructions: Leave empty to use WooCommerce product name

sub_fields.label: Display Price
sub_fields.name: display_price
sub_fields.instructions: Leave empty to use WooCommerce price

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Leave empty to use WooCommerce product image

sub_fields.label: Best Value
sub_fields.name: is_best_value
sub_fields.instructions: Highlight this product as best value

sub_fields.label: Free Item SKU
sub_fields.name: free_item_sku
sub_fields.instructions: Optional: SKU of a free item to add with purchase

fields.label: Button URL
fields.name: cta_button_url
fields.instructions: Leave empty to use checkout URL

fields.label: Checkout SPA Instructions
fields.message:
Checkout SPA Shortcode

The checkout flow uses a Single Page Application (SPA) that handles checkout upsell thank-you steps without page reloads.

Setup Instructions:

  1. Create a WordPress page for checkout (e.g., "Illumodine Checkout")
  2. Set the page permalink to: /express-shop/{funnel-slug}/checkout/
  3. Add this shortcode to the page content:
[hp_funnel_checkout_app]

Optional attributes:

[hp_funnel_checkout_app funnel="illumodine"]   
[hp_funnel_checkout_app id="123"]              
[hp_funnel_checkout_app product="SKU123"]

What the SPA handles automatically:

  • Product selection with quantity
  • Customer lookup on email blur
  • Auto-fill address for returning customers
  • Points redemption (if enabled below)
  • Stripe Elements inline payment
  • 3D Secure authentication
  • One-click upsell offers
  • Thank you page with order summary

fields.label: Custom CSS
fields.name: custom_css
fields.instructions: Custom CSS for this funnel. Use .hp-funnel-{slug} as the root selector.

fields.label: Disclaimer
fields.name: footer_disclaimer
fields.default_value: These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
